officialTitle: Post-operative Urinary Retention: A Prospective Randomized Study Identifying Patients at Risk and Reducing the Incidence Using Tamsulosin Pretreatment
inclusionCriteria:
* Male
* 18 years of age
* Presenting with hernia requiring surgical intervention
* Must be MALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Intolerability of tamsulosin or related drugs
* Investigator discretion
* Unwillingness or inability to comply with protocol procedures and assessments
